portfolioItems.title: HouseParry
portfolioItems.subTitle: Event Planning Platform
portfolioItems.summary: HouseParry is an innovative platform revolutionizing house party planning, starting in Lekki, Lagos. It simplifies event organization by connecting hosts with essential vendors, creating a seamless planning experience. As the lead frontend engineer, I built a responsive and dynamic interface using React.js, Next.js, and Three.js for 3D visuals. Key features include intuitive vendor listings, real-time event management, and an immersive design. This project showcases my skills in building user-focused, scalable applications with a balance of visual appeal and functionality.

portfolioItems.title: Bend&Select
portfolioItems.subTitle: Shopify Development
portfolioItems.summary: BendAndSelect is an e-commerce store powered by Shopify, offering a seamless shopping experience and shipping to customers worldwide. This project highlights my expertise in creating responsive, user-friendly Shopify stores with custom themes, global shipping integration, and optimized checkout flows, ensuring smooth performance across devices.

portfolioItems.title: SABI
portfolioItems.subTitle: PWA / Mobile Development
portfolioItems.summary: SABI is Africa’s largest B2B platform enabling informal trade across the continent. My contributions to this project were instrumental in expanding the platform’s reach and usability for over 1 million users across Africa. I played a key role in implementing multitenancy, enabling SABI to seamlessly support multiple business models and expand into new markets. Additionally, I developed interactive tour guides, simplifying the onboarding process and improving the overall user experience. These guides helped users quickly understand new features and increased platform engagement by making it more intuitive to navigate. The project also involved building a Progressive Web Application (PWA) using ReactJS, along with a mobile app built with React Native. I worked on integrating APIs for efficient data exchange, and the platform was designed for optimal performance across a wide range of devices. Technologies used include ReactJS, React Native, Redux, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and REST APIs.

portfolioItems.title: Belrald
portfolioItems.subTitle: Web Development
portfolioItems.summary: Belrald is an innovative edtech platform designed to streamline university management processes, enhancing operational efficiency and faculty-student engagement. This project highlights my ability to develop tailored solutions for the education sector. Key contribution include a debt management system that improves payment tracking and compliance for students. Technologies used in this project include ReactJS, Tailwind CSS, and API integrations to optimize payment processing and user experience.

portfolioItems.title: CasaBellyful
portfolioItems.subTitle: Web Development
portfolioItems.summary: CasaBellyful is a food vendor web application that integrates Paystack's payment gateway for seamless online transactions. Built using TypeScript, React, and Tailwind CSS, this platform allows users to browse food items, add them to a cart, and securely complete payments. Key features include cart management, real-time price calculation, and payment success/failure notifications. This project demonstrates my skills in e-commerce development and secure payment integrations.

portfolioItems.title: GTCO Shares Support AI
portfolioItems.subTitle: AI-Powered Support Tool
portfolioItems.summary: GTCO Shares Support AI is an AI-driven customer support tool that I built to provide real-time assistance to users interested in purchasing shares from Guaranty Trust (GTCO). Developed under tight deadlines as part of the Headstarter Fellowship, I  designed and built this application using Next.js, OpenAI, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS. The project showcases my skills in prompt engineering, creating a highly responsive UI that aligns with GTCO’s branding. Despite limited time, I delivered a functional and polished solution that enhances customer support in the financial sector.

portfolioItems.title: CESNO Energy
portfolioItems.subTitle: Web Development
portfolioItems.summary: CESNO ENERGY is a dynamic web platform built for a leading energy company that specializes in renewable energy solutions as well as oil and gas services. This project highlights my expertise in web development for corporate entities and my ability to create user-centric, responsive web applications. The website features a detailed overview of the company's mission and values, an extensive list of services, and informative content on energy solutions and industry trends. The user-friendly interface and modern design ensure a seamless experience across all devices, making it easy for users to navigate and find the information they need. Key technologies used in this project include HTML, CSS, JavaScript,bootstarap and an Email service for handling the contact form. Explore the CESNO ENERGY website to see how I brought this project to life, and visit the GitHub repository for a deeper look into the development process.
